org.deeplearning4j.nn.graph.vertex.impl

Class PreprocessorVertex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deeplearning4j.nn.graph.vertex.BaseGraphVertex
      • org.deeplearning4j.nn.graph.vertex.impl.PreprocessorVertex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, GraphVertex

    public class PreprocessorVertex
extends BaseGraphVertex
    PreprocessorVertex is a simple adaptor class that allows a InputPreProcessor to be used in a ComputationGraph GraphVertex, without it being associated with a layer.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Do backward pass
        Parameters:
        tbptt - If true: do backprop using truncated BPTT
        Returns:
